body:
I just released a PoC alpha https://rubygems.org/gems/code_metrics 0.0.1. It works pretty well.  Lemme know your thoughts on if you want to retain any stats functionality in rails, if it should only be in development, and what you'd like the behavior to be when someone requires 'rails/code_statistics' or runs 'rake stats'.

My thought is to include code_metrics as a development dependency and output helpful message when the code is sought in the rails code base.

Also see my questions in https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/11148#issuecomment-20201183 and https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/11148#issuecomment-20220361 and how we kept the STATS_DIRECTORIES global constant available https://github.com/bf4/code_metrics/commit/7cb3786d84f6199a6760cb623dc17e527d0be284
